name: Harold Tales - Maelstrom Leviathan - <MV> Disc 2
description:
I write this in the hopes of those who are reading to understand.

This was originally supposed to be my plan. My storm swallow. 

However, this matter no longer concerns just me. The higher beings deigned to facilitate the vain battle between Reid and Harold.

And Reid is destined to lose with absolute certainty. For that, I am in opposition.

Which is why I will abdicate my position to another Harold, who is attempting to restore a destroyed haroldmancer of time's past.

I anticipate that my seductress subordinate will shirk her duties to lust for the Harold I personally invited.

I simply hope it is enough. I kept this information away from my most loyal subordinate as well. 

She will be informed by the challenger to follow the soul that inherits the spirit of the Hero Harold that obliterated the Haroldmancer.

To interfere anymore would be to directly challenge the Harold blessed by the Metagod and I cannot fathom to be the fool who will do so.

But I will not have it be skewed fully in Harold's favor. That I will not allow.

Will you be able to complete the trial he set out and earn your rights of challenge, Reid?

-<Mechanics>-

Turn-based battles that allow you to apply more effects/power the more star energy you have.
